Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmScheduler

Packages that use VmScheduler
Package Description
org.cloudbus.cloudsim  
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter  
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power  

  • Uses of VmScheduler in org.cloudbus.cloudsim

    Subclasses of VmScheduler in org.cloudbus.cloudsim
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  VmSchedulerSpaceShared
    VmSchedulerSpaceShared is a VMM allocation policy that allocates one or more Pe to a VM, and doesn't allow sharing of PEs.
    class  VmSchedulerTimeShared
    VmSchedulerTimeShared is a VMM allocation policy that allocates one or more Pe to a VM, and allows sharing of PEs by multiple VMs.
    class  VmSchedulerTimeSharedOverSubscription
    This is a Time-Shared VM Scheduler, which allows over-subscription.
    Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that return VmScheduler
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    VmScheduler Host.getVmScheduler()
    Gets the VM scheduler.
    Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim with parameters of type VmScheduler
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void Host.setVmScheduler​(VmScheduler vmScheduler)
    Sets the VM scheduler.
